# Shannon Framework

Shannon Framework V4.1 is a rigorous specification-driven development plugin for Claude Code. Provides 8D complexity analysis, wave-based execution, NO MOCKS testing, and context preservation.

- [Plugin Installation](README.md#installation): How to install Shannon via Claude Code plugin marketplace

## Commands

- [/sh_spec](commands/sh_spec.md): Analyze specifications using 8D complexity framework
- [/sh_wave](commands/sh_wave.md): Execute wave-based development with parallel agent coordination
- [/shannon:prime](commands/shannon_prime.md): V4.1 unified session priming (replaces 6 separate commands, <60s)
- [/sh_discover_skills](commands/sh_discover_skills.md): V4.1 auto-discover and catalog all available skills
- [/sh_checkpoint](commands/sh_checkpoint.md): Create comprehensive checkpoints of session state
- [/sh_restore](commands/sh_restore.md): Restore complete project state from checkpoints
- [/sh_test](commands/sh_test.md): NO MOCKS functional testing orchestration and enforcement
- [/sh_status](commands/sh_status.md): Display Shannon framework status and health diagnostics
- [/sh_check_mcps](commands/sh_check_mcps.md): Verify MCP server configuration and connectivity
- [/sh_reflect](commands/sh_reflect.md): V4.1 honest gap analysis before completion claims
